summary.span: 数据绑定列表控件，用于可显示使用模板的项。

span.span: A data bound list control that displays items using templates.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本主题内容：In this topic: - [介绍Introduction](#introduction) - [模板Templates](#templates) - [自定义 DataList 控件的外观Customizing the Appearance of the DataList Control](#customizing_the_appearance_of_the_datalist_control) - [显示方向和布局Display Direction and Layout](#display_direction_and_layout) - [安全性Security](#security) - [声明性语法Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## 介绍Introduction 使用控件来显示模板定义的数据绑定列表。Use the control to display a template-defined data bound list. 控件支持选择和编辑。The control supports selecting and editing. ## 模板Templates 内容控件可以操作使用的模板。The contents of the control can be manipulated by using templates. 下表列出了支持的模板。The following table lists the supported templates. |模板名称Template Name|描述Description| |-------------------|-----------------| ||如果定义，提供的内容和布局中交替项。If defined, provides the content and layout for alternating items in the . 如果未定义，`ItemTemplate`使用。If not defined, `ItemTemplate` is used.| ||如果定义，提供的内容和布局项当前正在编辑中。If defined, provides the content and layout for the item currently being edited in the . 如果未定义，`ItemTemplate`使用。If not defined, `ItemTemplate` is used.| ||如果定义，提供的内容和布局的脚注部分的。If defined, provides the content and layout for the footer section of the . 如果未定义，则不会显示脚注部分。If not defined, a footer section will not be displayed.| ||如果定义，提供的内容和布局的标头部分的。If defined, provides the content and layout for the header section of the . 如果未定义，将不显示标头部分。If not defined, a header section will not be displayed.| ||提供的内容和布局中的项的所需的模板。Required template that provides the content and layout for items in the .| ||如果定义，提供的内容和布局中的当前选定项。If defined, provides the content and layout for the currently selected item in the . 如果未定义，使用。If not defined, is used.| ||如果定义，提供的内容和布局中的项之间的分隔符。If defined, provides the content and layout for the separator between items in the . 如果未定义，则不会显示一个分隔符。If not defined, a separator will not be displayed.| 至少，需要定义要显示中的项控件。At the very minimum, the needs to be defined to display the items in the control. 可以使用其他模板来提供自定义信息，请参阅控件。Additional templates can be used to provide a custom look to the control. ## 自定义 DataList 控件的外观Customizing the Appearance of the DataList Control 外观可以通过设置控件的不同部分的样式属性自定义控件。The appearance of the control may be customized by setting the style properties for the different parts of the control. 下表列出了不同的样式属性。The following table lists the different style properties. |样式属性Style Property|描述Description| |--------------------|-----------------| ||指定的样式中交替项控件。Specifies the style for alternating items in the control.| ||指定在所编辑的项的样式控件。Specifies the style for the item being edited in the control.| ||指定的样式中的页脚控件。Specifies the style for the footer in the control.| ||指定的标头中的样式控件。Specifies the style for the header in the control.| ||指定的样式中的项控件。Specifies the style for the items in the control.| ||指定的样式中的选定项控件。Specifies the style for the selected item in the control.| ||指定的样式中的项之间的分隔符控件。Specifies the style for the separator between the items in the control.| 您还可以显示或隐藏控件的不同部分。You can also show or hide different parts of the control. 下表列出了用于控制哪些部分是显示还是隐藏的属性。The following table lists the properties that control which parts are shown or hidden. |PropertyProperty|描述Description| |--------------|-----------------| ||显示或隐藏的脚注部分的控件。Shows or hides the footer section of the control.| ||显示或隐藏的标头部分控件。Shows or hides the header section of the control.| ## 显示方向和布局Display Direction and Layout 显示方向控件可以垂直或水平。The display direction of a control can be vertical or horizontal. 设置属性指定的显示方向。Set the property to specify the display direction. 布局控制是使用属性。The layout of the control is controlled with the property. 此属性设置为`RepeatLayout.Table`将显示表格式，虽然`RepeatLayout.Flow`显示不以表结构。Setting this property to `RepeatLayout.Table` will display the in a table format, while `RepeatLayout.Flow` displays the without a table structure. ## 安全性Security `DataList`控件可以包含让用户输入信息的控件。The `DataList` control can contain controls that enable users to enter information. > [!CAUTION] > 此控件用于显示用户输入，这可能包括恶意客户端脚本。This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script. 检查从客户端的可执行脚本、 SQL 语句或其他代码之前发送应用程序中显示的任何信息。Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application. 验证控件可用于在控件中显示输入的文本之前验证用户输入。You can use validation controls to verify user input before displaying the input text in a control. ASP.NET 提供了用户输入到脚本块和 HTML 的输入的请求验证功能。ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input. 有关安全性的详细信息，请参阅[保护标准控件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8)，[如何： 保护对脚本攻击在 Web 应用程序通过应用 HTML 编码为字符串](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b)，和[ASP.NET 网页中验证用户输入](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461)。For more information about security, see [Securing Standard Controls](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8), [How to: Protect Against Script Exploits in a Web Application by Applying HTML Encoding to Strings](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b), and [Validating User Input in ASP.NET Web Pages](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461). ## 声明性语法Declarative Syntax ```                                                                                                                                                                                              ``` ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用控件来显示数据源中的项的列表。The following code example demonstrates how to use a control to display a list of items from a data source. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单个文件代码模型，如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件可能无法正常运行。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空文本文件。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). summary.span: 获取 控件中交替项的样式属性。

span.span: Gets the style properties for alternating items in the control.

value.span: 一个 对象，该对象表示 控件中交替项的样式属性。

span.span: A object that represents the style properties for alternating items in the control.

value.span: 默认值是一个空 对象。

span.span: The default value is an empty object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用中的属性以提供自定义样式的交替项控件。Use the property to provide a custom style for the alternating items in the control. 可以调整的常见样式属性包括前景色、 背景色、 字体和单元格内的内容对齐方式。Common style attributes that can be adjusted include foreground color, background color, font, and content alignment within the cell. 提供不同的样式可增强的外观控件。Providing a different style enhances the appearance of the control. 项中的样式属性控件从一个项的样式属性继承到另一个通过层次结构。Item style properties in the control are inherited from one item style property to another through a hierarchy. 由更高版本的层次结构中的项的样式属性继承层次结构中设置较低的项的样式属性。Item style properties set lower in the hierarchy are inherited by item style properties higher in the hierarchy. 例如，如果指定的红色字体属性中中的所有其他项样式属性控件还将具有红色字体。For example, if you specify a red font for the property, all other item style properties in the control will also have a red font. 这使您可以通过设置单个项的样式属性提供对控件的常见外观。This allows you to provide a common appearance for the control by setting a single item style property. 您可以重写是通过设置其样式属性的层次结构中较高的项样式属性的继承的样式设置。You can override the inherited style settings for an item style property that is higher in the hierarchy by setting its style properties. 例如，可以指定为蓝色字体属性，重写中指定的红色字体属性。For example, you can specify a blue font for the property, overriding the red font specified in the property. 下表列出了从最高到低的层次结构顺序。The following table lists the hierarchy order from highest to lowest. |优先级Precedence|样式属性Style property| |----------------|--------------------| |11|| |22|| |33|| |44|| |55|| 若要指定交替项的自定义样式，请将置于``标记的开始和结束标记之间控件。To specify a custom style for the alternating items, place the `` tags between the opening and closing tags of the control. 然后可以列出的样式特性的开始``标记。You can then list the style attributes within the opening `` tag. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来指定不同的背景色中交替项控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify a different background color for alternating items in the control. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单个文件代码模型，如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件可能无法正常运行。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空文本文件。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来控制中交替项的内容控件。Use the property to control the contents of alternating items in the control. 交替项的外观由控制属性。The appearance of alternating items is controlled by the property. 若要指定为交替项模板，请将置于``标记的开始和结束标记之间控件。To specify a template for the alternating items, place the `` tags between the opening and closing tags of the control. 然后可以列出模板的开始和结束之间的内容``标记。You can then list the contents of the template between the opening and closing `` tags. > [!CAUTION] > 此控件用于显示用户输入，这可能包括恶意客户端脚本。This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script. 检查从客户端的可执行脚本、 SQL 语句或其他代码之前发送应用程序中显示的任何信息。Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application. 验证控件可用于在控件中显示输入的文本之前验证用户输入。You can use validation controls to verify user input before displaying the input text in a control. ASP.NET 提供了用户输入到脚本块和 HTML 的输入的请求验证功能。ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input. 有关详细信息，请参阅[保护标准控件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8)，[如何： 保护对脚本攻击在 Web 应用程序通过应用 HTML 编码为字符串](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b)，和[中验证用户输入ASP.NET Web Pages](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461)。For more information, see [Securing Standard Controls](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8), [How to: Protect Against Script Exploits in a Web Application by Applying HTML Encoding to Strings](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b), and [Validating User Input in ASP.NET Web Pages](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来控制中交替项的内容控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to control the contents of alternating items in the control. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单个文件代码模型，如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件可能无法正常运行。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空文本文件。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). summary.span: 对 控件中的某项单击 按钮时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the button is clicked for an item in the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时`Cancel`中的某个项单击按钮控件。The event is raised when the `Cancel` button is clicked for an item in the control. 典型处理程序事件将设置属性设置为`-1`（若要取消选择项），然后将重新绑定到数据控件。A typical handler for the event sets the property to `-1` (to deselect the item) and then rebinds the data to the control. > [!CAUTION] > 文本不是 HTML 编码在显示之前控件。Text is not HTML encoded before it is displayed in the control. 这样，可以在文本中嵌入在 HTML 标记中的脚本。This makes it possible to embed script within HTML tags in the text. 如果控件的值来自于用户输入，请确保验证减少安全漏洞的值。If the values for the control come from user input, be sure to validate the values to reduce security vulnerabilities. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[如何： 使用 Web 窗体应用程序中的事件](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-consume-events-in-a-web-forms-application.md)。For more information about handling events, see [How to: Consume Events in a Web Forms Application](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-consume-events-in-a-web-forms-application.md). > [!CAUTION] > 此控件用于显示用户输入，这可能包括恶意客户端脚本。This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script. 检查从客户端的可执行脚本、 SQL 语句或其他代码之前发送应用程序中显示的任何信息。Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application. 验证控件可用于在控件中显示输入的文本之前验证用户输入。You can use validation controls to verify user input before displaying the input text in a control. ASP.NET 提供了用户输入到脚本块和 HTML 的输入的请求验证功能。ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input. 有关详细信息，请参阅[保护标准控件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8)，[如何： 保护对脚本攻击在 Web 应用程序通过应用 HTML 编码为字符串](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b)，和[中验证用户输入ASP.NET Web Pages](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461)。For more information, see [Securing Standard Controls](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8), [How to: Protect Against Script Exploits in a Web Application by Applying HTML Encoding to Strings](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b), and [Validating User Input in ASP.NET Web Pages](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何指定和编写代码的处理程序事件。The following code example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for the event. 它会取消对中的项所做的任何编辑控制何时`Cancel`单击按钮。It cancels any edits made to an item in the control when the `Cancel` button is clicked. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单个文件代码模型，如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件可能无法正常运行。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空文本文件。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时`Edit`中的某个项单击按钮控件。The event is raised when the `Edit` button is clicked for an item in the control. 典型处理程序事件将设置属性设置为所选的行，然后将重新绑定到数据控件。A typical handler for the event sets the property to the selected row and then rebinds the data to the control. > [!CAUTION] > 文本不是 HTML 编码在显示之前控件。Text is not HTML encoded before it is displayed in the control. 这样，可以在文本中嵌入在 HTML 标记中的脚本。This makes it possible to embed script within HTML tags in the text. 如果控件的值来自于用户输入，请确保验证减少安全漏洞的值。If the values for the control come from user input, be sure to validate the values to reduce security vulnerabilities. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[如何： 使用 Web 窗体应用程序中的事件](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-consume-events-in-a-web-forms-application.md)。For more information about handling events, see [How to: Consume Events in a Web Forms Application](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-consume-events-in-a-web-forms-application.md). > [!CAUTION] > 此控件用于显示用户输入，这可能包括恶意客户端脚本。This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script. 检查从客户端的可执行脚本、 SQL 语句或其他代码之前发送应用程序中显示的任何信息。Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application. 验证控件可用于在控件中显示输入的文本之前验证用户输入。You can use validation controls to verify user input before displaying the input text in a control. ASP.NET 提供了用户输入到脚本块和 HTML 的输入的请求验证功能。ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input. 有关详细信息，请参阅[保护标准控件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8)，[如何： 保护对脚本攻击在 Web 应用程序通过应用 HTML 编码为字符串](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b)，和[中验证用户输入ASP.NET Web Pages](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461)。For more information, see [Securing Standard Controls](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8), [How to: Protect Against Script Exploits in a Web Application by Applying HTML Encoding to Strings](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b), and [Validating User Input in ASP.NET Web Pages](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何指定和编写代码的处理程序事件。The following code example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for the event. 它允许您编辑中的选定的项控制何时`Edit`单击按钮。It allows you to edit the selected item in the control when the `Edit` button is clicked. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单个文件代码模型，如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件可能无法正常运行。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空文本文件。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性以编程方式指定要编辑的项。Use the property to programmatically specify the item to edit. 此属性还可用于确定为编辑选定的项的索引。You can also use this property to determine the index of the item selected for editing. > [!NOTE] > 属性是从零开始。The property is zero based. 若要取消选择一个选项，设置属性设置为`-1`。To unselect an item, set the property to `-1`. > [!CAUTION] > 此控件用于显示用户输入，这可能包括恶意客户端脚本。This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script. 检查从客户端的可执行脚本、 SQL 语句或其他代码之前发送应用程序中显示的任何信息。Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application. 验证控件可用于在控件中显示输入的文本之前验证用户输入。You can use validation controls to verify user input before displaying the input text in a control. ASP.NET 提供了用户输入到脚本块和 HTML 的输入的请求验证功能。ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input. 有关详细信息，请参阅[保护标准控件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8)，[如何： 保护对脚本攻击在 Web 应用程序通过应用 HTML 编码为字符串](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b)，和[中验证用户输入ASP.NET Web Pages](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461)。For more information, see [Securing Standard Controls](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8), [How to: Protect Against Script Exploits in a Web Application by Applying HTML Encoding to Strings](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b), and [Validating User Input in ASP.NET Web Pages](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461). 属性存储在控件状态。The property is stored in control state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来指定用户以进行编辑所选的项。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the item selected by the user for editing. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单个文件代码模型，如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件可能无法正常运行。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空文本文件。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性中为进行编辑所选的项提供自定义样式控件。Use the property to provide a custom style for the item selected for editing in the control. 可以调整的常见样式属性包括前景色、 背景色、 字体和单元格内的内容对齐方式。Common style attributes that can be adjusted include foreground color, background color, font, and content alignment within the cell. 提供不同的样式可增强的外观控件。Providing a different style enhances the appearance of the control. 项中的样式属性控件从一个项的样式属性继承到另一个通过层次结构。Item style properties in the control are inherited from one item style property to another through a hierarchy. 由更高版本的层次结构中的项的样式属性继承层次结构中设置较低的项的样式属性。Item style properties set lower in the hierarchy are inherited by item style properties higher in the hierarchy. 例如，如果指定的红色字体属性中中的所有其他项样式属性控件还将具有红色字体。For example, if you specify a red font for the property, all other item style properties in the control will also have a red font. 这使您可以通过设置单个项的样式属性提供对控件的常见外观。This allows you to provide a common appearance for the control by setting a single item style property. 您可以重写是通过设置其样式属性的层次结构中较高的项样式属性的继承的样式设置。You can override the inherited style settings for an item style property that is higher in the hierarchy by setting its style properties. 例如，可以指定为蓝色字体属性，重写中指定的红色字体属性。For example, you can specify a blue font for the property, overriding the red font specified in the property. 下表列出了从最高到低的层次结构顺序。The following table lists the hierarchy order from highest to lowest. |优先级Precedence|样式属性Style Property| |----------------|--------------------| |11|| |22|| |33|| |44|| |55|| 若要指定自定义样式进行编辑所选的项，请将置于``标记的开始和结束标记之间控件。To specify a custom style for the item selected for editing, place the `` tags between the opening and closing tags of the control. 然后可以列出的样式特性的开始``标记。You can then list the style attributes within the opening `` tag. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来指定不同的外观由用户进行编辑所选的项。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify a different appearance for the item selected by the user for editing. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单个文件代码模型，如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件可能无法正常运行。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空文本文件。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来控制为中编辑选定的项的内容控件。Use the property to control the contents of the item selected for editing in the control. 选择用于编辑受控制的项的外观属性。The appearance of the item selected for editing is controlled by the property. 若要指定用于编辑所选的项模板，请将置于``标记的开始和结束标记之间控件。To specify a template for the item selected for editing, place the `` tags between the opening and closing tags of the control. 然后可以列出模板的开始和结束之间的内容``标记。You can then list the contents of the template between the opening and closing `` tags. > [!CAUTION] > 此控件用于显示用户输入，这可能包括恶意客户端脚本。This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script. 检查从客户端的可执行脚本、 SQL 语句或其他代码之前发送应用程序中显示的任何信息。Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application. 验证控件可用于在控件中显示输入的文本之前验证用户输入。You can use validation controls to verify user input before displaying the input text in a control. ASP.NET 提供了用户输入到脚本块和 HTML 的输入的请求验证功能。ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input. 有关详细信息，请参阅[保护标准控件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8)，[如何： 保护对脚本攻击在 Web 应用程序通过应用 HTML 编码为字符串](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b)，和[中验证用户输入ASP.NET Web Pages](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461)。For more information, see [Securing Standard Controls](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8), [How to: Protect Against Script Exploits in a Web Application by Applying HTML Encoding to Strings](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b), and [Validating User Input in ASP.NET Web Pages](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来控制用户用于编辑所选的项的内容。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to control the contents of the item selected by the user for editing. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单个文件代码模型，如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件可能无法正常运行。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空文本文件。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 控件的行（在 控件的每一模板中定义）是否被提取和显示。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the rows of a control, defined in each template of a control, are extracted and displayed.

value.span: 如果 控件的行（在 控件的各模板中定义）被提取和显示，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the rows of a control, defined in each template of a control, are extracted and displayed; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 内容控件使用指定的模板。The contents of the control are specified by using templates. 通常情况下，你列出你想要在模板中显示的控件。Normally, you list controls that you want to display in the templates. 您也可以放置控制在模板中并显示表的行。You can also place a control in a template and display the rows of the table. 使用属性指定是否的行控件中的每个模板定义控件被提取和显示。Use the property to specify whether the rows of a control defined in each template of a control are extracted and displayed. 从的模板中提取的所有行控件显示在单个表。All rows extracted from the templates of the control are displayed in a single table. 这使您可以从其他较小的表创建一个表，同时仍保持功能的控件。This allows you to create a single table from other smaller tables and still maintain the features of the control. > [!NOTE] > 当此属性设置为`true`，则必须提供格式正确想要包括在每个模板的控件控件。When this property is set to `true`, you must provide a well-formed control for each template you want to include in the control. 将显示仅表的行。Only the rows of the tables will be displayed. 在模板中的其他所有内容将被都忽略。All other content in the template will be ignored. 必须使用控制此功能才能正常工作。You must use a control for this feature to work properly. 控件不是此属性与兼容。The control is not compatible with this property. 当您创建的某个单元控件在模板中，可以使用属性的对象以控制的单元格跨越的列数。When you create a cell for a control in a template, you can use the property of the object to control the number of columns the cell spans. 此外可以使用属性控制的单元格跨越的行数。You can also use the property to control the number of rows the cell spans. > [!NOTE] > ， ，并属性不会影响的外观控制当此属性设置为`true`。The , , and properties do not affect the appearance of the control when this property is set to `true`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来提取和显示的行控件的模板中定义控件。The following code example demonstrate how to use the property to extract and display the rows of controls defined in the templates of the control. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单个文件代码模型，如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件可能无法正常运行。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空文本文件。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性提供的脚注部分的自定义样式控件。Use this property to provide a custom style for the footer section of the control. 可以调整的常见样式属性包括前景色、 背景色、 字体和单元格内的内容对齐方式。Common style attributes that can be adjusted include foreground color, background color, font, and content alignment within the cell. 提供不同的样式可增强的外观控件。Providing a different style enhances the appearance of the control. 的属性控件要继承的样式设置属性。The property of the control inherits the style settings of the property. 例如，如果指定的红色字体属性，属性也将具有红色字体。For example, if you specify a red font for the property, the property will also have a red font. 这使您可以通过设置一个样式属性提供对控件的常见外观。This allows you to provide a common appearance for the control by setting a single style property. 可以通过设置重写继承的样式设置属性。You can override the inherited style settings by setting the property. 例如，可以指定为蓝色字体属性，重写中指定的红色字体属性。For example, you can specify a blue font for the property, overriding the red font specified in the property. 若要指定自定义样式的脚注部分，将放置``标记的开始和结束标记之间控件。To specify a custom style for the footer section, place the `` tags between the opening and closing tags of the control. 然后可以列出的样式特性的开始``标记。You can then list the style attributes within the opening `` tag. > [!NOTE] > 属性必须设置为`true`，此属性才可见。The property must be set to `true` for this property to be visible. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来指定自定义背景色的脚注部分的控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify a custom background color for the footer section of the control. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单个文件代码模型，如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件可能无法正常运行。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空文本文件。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性控制的标题部分的内容。Use the property to control the contents of the heading section. 标头部分的外观由控制属性。The appearance of the header section is controlled by the property. > [!NOTE] > 属性必须设置为`true`，此属性才可见。The property must be set to `true` for this property to be visible. 若要指定的标题部分的模板，请将置于``标记的开始和结束标记之间控件。To specify a template for the heading section, place the `` tags between the opening and closing tags of the control. 然后可以列出模板的开始和结束之间的内容``标记。You can then list the contents of the template between the opening and closing `` tags. > [!CAUTION] > 此控件用于显示用户输入，这可能包括恶意客户端脚本。This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script. 检查从客户端的可执行脚本、 SQL 语句或其他代码之前发送应用程序中显示的任何信息。Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application. 验证控件可用于在控件中显示输入的文本之前验证用户输入。You can use validation controls to verify user input before displaying the input text in a control. ASP.NET 提供了用户输入到脚本块和 HTML 的输入的请求验证功能。ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input. 有关详细信息，请参阅[保护标准控件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8)，[如何： 保护对脚本攻击在 Web 应用程序通过应用 HTML 编码为字符串](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b)，和[中验证用户输入ASP.NET Web Pages](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461)。For more information, see [Securing Standard Controls](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8), [How to: Protect Against Script Exploits in a Web Application by Applying HTML Encoding to Strings](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b), and [Validating User Input in ASP.NET Web Pages](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来控制的标题部分的内容控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to control the contents of the heading section of the control. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单个文件代码模型，如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件可能无法正常运行。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空文本文件。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用集合以编程方式控制中的项控件。Use the collection to programmatically control the items in the control. 集合不提供任何方法来添加或移除项的集合。The collection does not provide any methods to add or remove items to the collection. 但是，您可以控制项内容的处理程序，从而事件。However, you can control the contents of an item by providing a handler for the event. > [!NOTE] > 仅绑定到数据源的项包含在集合。Only items bound to the data source are contained in the collection. 集合中不包含标头、 页脚和分隔符。The header, footer, and separator are not included in the collection. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用集合中的项目的显示控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the collection to display the items in the control. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单个文件代码模型，如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件可能无法正常运行。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空文本文件。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property ItemStyle As TableItemStyle

summary.span: 获取 控件中项的样式属性。

span.span: Gets the style properties for the items in the control.

value.span: 一个 对象，该对象包含 控件中项的样式属性。

span.span: A object that contains the style properties for the items in the control.

value.span: 默认值是一个空 对象。

span.span: The default value is an empty object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性的项提供自定义样式控件。Use this property to provide a custom style for the items of the control. 可以调整的常见样式属性包括前景色、 背景色、 字体和单元格内的内容对齐方式。Common style attributes that can be adjusted include foreground color, background color, font, and content alignment within the cell. 提供不同的样式可增强的外观控件。Providing a different style enhances the appearance of the control. 项中的样式属性控件从一个项的样式属性继承到另一个通过层次结构。Item style properties in the control are inherited from one item style property to another through a hierarchy. 由更高版本的层次结构中的项的样式属性继承层次结构中设置较低的项的样式属性。Item style properties set lower in the hierarchy are inherited by item style properties higher in the hierarchy. 例如，如果指定的红色字体属性中中的所有其他项样式属性控件还将具有红色字体。For example, if you specify a red font for the property, all other item style properties in the control will also have a red font. 这使您可以通过设置单个项的样式属性提供对控件的常见外观。This allows you to provide a common appearance for the control by setting a single item style property. 您可以重写是通过设置其样式属性的层次结构中较高的项样式属性的继承的样式设置。You can override the inherited style settings for an item style property that is higher in the hierarchy by setting its style properties. 例如，可以指定为蓝色字体属性，重写中指定的红色字体属性。For example, you can specify a blue font for the property, overriding the red font specified in the property. 下表列出了从最高到低的层次结构顺序。The following table lists the hierarchy order from highest to lowest. |优先级Precedence|样式属性Style Property| |----------------|--------------------| |11|| |22|| |33|| |44|| |55|| 若要指定的项的自定义样式控件，将放置``标记的开始和结束标记之间控件。To specify a custom style for the items of the control, place the `` tags between the opening and closing tags of the control. 然后可以列出的样式特性的开始``标记。You can then list the style attributes within the opening `` tag. 此外可以使用中的属性以提供不同的外观的交替项控件。You can also use the property to provide a different appearance for the alternating items in the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来指定不同的背景色为中的项控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify a different background color for the items in the control. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单个文件代码模型，如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件可能无法正常运行。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空文本文件。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来控制中的项的内容控件。Use the property to control the contents of the items in the control. 中的项的外观控制是通过属性。The appearance of the items in the control is controlled by the property. 若要指定的项模板控件，将置于``标记的开始和结束标记之间控件。To specify a template for the items of the control, place the `` tags between the opening and closing tags of the control. 然后可以列出模板的开始和结束之间的内容``标记。You can then list the contents of the template between the opening and closing `` tags. 你可以选择使用中的属性以提供不同的外观的交替项控件。You can optionally use the property to provide a different appearance for the alternating items in the control. > [!CAUTION] > 此控件用于显示用户输入，这可能包括恶意客户端脚本。This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script. 检查从客户端的可执行脚本、 SQL 语句或其他代码之前发送应用程序中显示的任何信息。Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application. 验证控件可用于在控件中显示输入的文本之前验证用户输入。You can use validation controls to verify user input before displaying the input text in a control. ASP.NET 提供了用户输入到脚本块和 HTML 的输入的请求验证功能。ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input. 有关详细信息，请参阅[保护标准控件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8)，[如何： 保护对脚本攻击在 Web 应用程序通过应用 HTML 编码为字符串](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b)，和[中验证用户输入ASP.NET Web Pages](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461)。For more information, see [Securing Standard Controls](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8), [How to: Protect Against Script Exploits in a Web Application by Applying HTML Encoding to Strings](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b), and [Validating User Input in ASP.NET Web Pages](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来控制中的项的内容控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to control the contents of the items in the control. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单个文件代码模型，如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件可能无法正常运行。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空文本文件。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法主要由.NET Framework 基础结构并不应在代码中直接使用。This method is used primarily by the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code. 但是，控件开发人员可以重写此方法以指定自定义服务器控件还原其视图状态的方式。However, control developers can override this method to specify how a custom server control restores its view state. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 状态管理概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce(v=vs.100)). 方法将还原的视图状态信息控件从保存的上一个页请求方法。The method restores view-state information for the control from a previous page request that was saved by the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法以提供自定义处理程序事件。Use the method to provide a custom handler for the event. 引发事件时`Cancel`中的某个项单击按钮控件。The event is raised when the `Cancel` button is clicked for an item in the control. 典型处理程序事件将设置属性设置为`-1`（若要取消选择项），然后将重新绑定到数据控件。A typical handler for the event sets the property to `-1` (to deselect the item) and then rebinds the data to the control. > [!CAUTION] > 此控件用于显示用户输入，这可能包括恶意客户端脚本。This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script. 检查从客户端的可执行脚本、 SQL 语句或其他代码之前发送应用程序中显示的任何信息。Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application. 验证控件可用于在控件中显示输入的文本之前验证用户输入。You can use validation controls to verify user input before displaying the input text in a control. ASP.NET 提供了用户输入到脚本块和 HTML 的输入的请求验证功能。ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input. 有关详细信息，请参阅[保护标准控件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8)，[如何： 保护对脚本攻击在 Web 应用程序通过应用 HTML 编码为字符串](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b)，和[中验证用户输入ASP.NET Web Pages](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461)。For more information, see [Securing Standard Controls](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8), [How to: Protect Against Script Exploits in a Web Application by Applying HTML Encoding to Strings](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b), and [Validating User Input in ASP.NET Web Pages](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461). 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何： 使用 Web 窗体应用程序中的事件](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-consume-events-in-a-web-forms-application.md)。For more information, see [How to: Consume Events in a Web Forms Application](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-consume-events-in-a-web-forms-application.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何指定和编写代码的处理程序事件。The following code example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for the event. 它会取消对中的项所做的任何编辑控制何时`Cancel`单击按钮。It cancels any edits made to an item in the control when the `Cancel` button is clicked. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单个文件代码模型，如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件可能无法正常运行。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空文本文件。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法以提供自定义处理程序事件。Use the method to provide a custom handler for the event. 中单击任何按钮时引发事件控件并具有自定义按钮控件时通常会用`CommandName`值，例如`Add`，在控件。The event is raised when any button is clicked in the control and is commonly used when you have a button control with a custom `CommandName` value, such as `Add`, in the control. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何： 使用 Web 窗体应用程序中的事件](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-consume-events-in-a-web-forms-application.md)。For more information, see [How to: Consume Events in a Web Forms Application](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-consume-events-in-a-web-forms-application.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何指定和编写代码的处理程序事件以选择项从控件。The following code example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for the event to select an item from the control. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单个文件代码模型，如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件可能无法正常运行。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空文本文件。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法以提供自定义处理程序事件。Use the method to provide a custom handler for the event. 引发事件时`Update`按钮的单击某项。The event is raised when the `Update` button for an item is clicked. 典型处理程序事件更新的数据集属性设置为`-1`（若要取消选择项），然后将重新绑定到数据控件。A typical handler for the event updates the data, sets the property to `-1` (to deselect the item), and then rebinds the data to the control. > [!CAUTION] > 此控件用于显示用户输入，这可能包括恶意客户端脚本。This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script. 检查从客户端的可执行脚本、 SQL 语句或其他代码之前发送应用程序中显示的任何信息。Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application. 验证控件可用于在控件中显示输入的文本之前验证用户输入。You can use validation controls to verify user input before displaying the input text in a control. ASP.NET 提供了用户输入到脚本块和 HTML 的输入的请求验证功能。ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input. 有关详细信息，请参阅[保护标准控件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8)，[如何： 保护对脚本攻击在 Web 应用程序通过应用 HTML 编码为字符串](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b)，和[中验证用户输入ASP.NET Web Pages](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461)。For more information, see [Securing Standard Controls](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8), [How to: Protect Against Script Exploits in a Web Application by Applying HTML Encoding to Strings](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b), and [Validating User Input in ASP.NET Web Pages](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461). 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何： 使用 Web 窗体应用程序中的事件](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-consume-events-in-a-web-forms-application.md)。For more information, see [How to: Consume Events in a Web Forms Application](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-consume-events-in-a-web-forms-application.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何指定和编写代码的处理程序事件。The following code example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for the event. 它允许你更新中的选定的项与用户输入的新值的控件时`Update`单击按钮。It allows you to update the selected item in the control with the new values entered by the user when the `Update` button is clicked. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单个文件代码模型，如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件可能无法正常运行。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空文本文件。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性指定的显示中的项的列数控件。Use this property to specify the number of columns that display items in the control. 例如，如果将此属性设置为`5`，则控件五个列中显示它的项。For example, if you set this property to `5`, the control displays its items in five columns. > [!NOTE] > 如果此属性设置为`0`，则控件中单个行或列中，值的基础显示它的项属性。If this property is set to `0`, the control displays its items in a single row or column, based on the value of the property. 如果属性设置为`RepeatDirection.Horizontal`，单个行中显示的项目。If the property is set to `RepeatDirection.Horizontal`, the items are displayed in a single row. 如果属性设置为`RepeatDirection.Vertical`，单个列中显示的项目。If the property is set to `RepeatDirection.Vertical`, the items are displayed in a single column. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来指定要在中显示的列数控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the number of columns to display in the control. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单个文件代码模型，如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件可能无法正常运行。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空文本文件。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性指定的显示方向控件。Use the property to specify the display direction of the control. > [!NOTE] > 显示的列数始终由属性。The number of columns displayed is always determined by the property. 如果此属性设置为`RepeatDirection.Vertical`，列表中的项显示在加载从上到下的列，然后从左到右，直到呈现出所有项。If this property is set to `RepeatDirection.Vertical`, the items in the list are displayed in columns loaded from top to bottom, then left to right, until all items are rendered. 例如，如果属性设置为`3`中的项控件显示在三个列，如以下表中所示。For example, if the property is set to `3`, the items in the control are displayed in three columns, as in the following table. |||| |-|-|-| |11|44|77| |22|55|88| |33|66|99| 如果此属性设置为`RepeatDirection.Horizontal`，列表中的项显示在加载从左到右的行中，然后直到呈现出所有项从上到下。If this property is set to `RepeatDirection.Horizontal`, the items in the list are displayed in rows loaded from left to right, then top to bottom, until all items are rendered. 例如，如果属性设置为`3`的项下表中显示控件中的每个、 三个项的行。For example, if the property is set to `3`, the items of the control are displayed in rows of three items each, as in the following table. |||| |-|-|-| |11|22|33| |44|55|66| |77|88|99| ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性中指定的方向显示控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the direction in which the control is displayed. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单个文件代码模型，如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件可能无法正常运行。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空文本文件。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. summary.span: 保存自页回发到服务器后发生的控件视图状态更改。

span.span: Saves the changes to the control view state since the time the page was posted back to the server.

returns.span: 包含 视图状态更改的对象。

span.span: The object that contains the changes to the view state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法主要由控件开发人员。The method is used primarily by control developers. 视图状态是累积的服务器控件的属性的值。View state is the accumulation of the values of a server control's properties. 这些值自动放置在服务器控件的属性，它是实例的类。These values are automatically placed in the server control's property, which is an instance of the class. 属性的值随后将保留到字符串对象后的服务器控件的生命周期的保存状态阶段。The property's value is then persisted to a string object after the save-state stage of the server control's life cycle. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 页面生命周期概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7949d756-1a79-464e-891f-904b1cfc7991)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Page Life Cycle Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7949d756-1a79-464e-891f-904b1cfc7991). 保存视图状态时，此字符串对象返回到客户端为存储在隐藏的 HTML input 元素中的变量。When view state is saved, this string object is returned to the client as a variable that is stored in a hidden HTML input element. 如果您创作的自定义服务器控件，您可以通过重写提高效率方法并修改服务器控件的属性。When you author custom server controls, you can improve efficiency by overriding the method and modifying the property for your server control. 有关详细信息，请参阅[开发自定义 ASP.NET 服务器控件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fbe26c16-cff4-4089-b3dd-877411f0c0ef)并[ASP.NET 状态管理概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Developing Custom ASP.NET Server Controls](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fbe26c16-cff4-4089-b3dd-877411f0c0ef) and [ASP.NET State Management Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce(v=vs.100)).

span.span: The default value is an empty object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性为中的选定项提供自定义样式控件。Use this property to provide a custom style for the selected item in the control. 可以调整的常见样式属性包括前景色、 背景色、 字体和单元格内的内容对齐方式。Common style attributes that can be adjusted include foreground color, background color, font, and content alignment within the cell. 提供不同的样式可增强的外观控件。Providing a different style enhances the appearance of the control. 项中的样式属性控件从一个项的样式属性继承到另一个通过层次结构。Item style properties in the control are inherited from one item style property to another through a hierarchy. 由更高版本的层次结构中的项的样式属性继承层次结构中设置较低的项的样式属性。Item style properties set lower in the hierarchy are inherited by item style properties higher in the hierarchy. 例如，如果指定的红色字体属性中中的所有其他项样式属性控件还将具有红色字体。For example, if you specify a red font for the property, all other item style properties in the control will also have a red font. 这使您可以通过设置单个项的样式属性提供对控件的常见外观。This allows you to provide a common appearance for the control by setting a single item style property. 您可以重写是通过设置其样式属性的层次结构中较高的项样式属性的继承的样式设置。You can override the inherited style settings for an item style property that is higher in the hierarchy by setting its style properties. 例如，可以指定为蓝色字体属性，重写中指定的红色字体属性。For example, you can specify a blue font for the property, overriding the red font specified in the property. 下表列出了从最高到低的层次结构顺序。The following table lists the hierarchy order from highest to lowest. |优先级Precedence|样式属性Style Property| |----------------|--------------------| |11|| |22|| |33|| |44|| |55|| 若要指定选定项的自定义样式，请将置于``标记的开始和结束标记之间控件。To specify a custom style for the selected item, place the `` tags between the opening and closing tags of the control. 然后可以列出的样式特性的开始``标记。You can then list the style attributes within the opening `` tag. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来指定中的选定项的自定义背景颜色控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify a custom background color for the selected item in the control. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单个文件代码模型，如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件可能无法正常运行。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空文本文件。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来控制所选的项的内容。Use the property to control the contents of the selected item. 所选的项的外观由控制属性。The appearance of the selected item is controlled by the property. 若要指定所选的项的模板，请将置于``标记的开始和结束标记之间控件。To specify a template for the selected item, place the `` tags between the opening and closing tags of the control. 然后可以列出模板的开始和结束之间的内容``标记。You can then list the contents of the template between the opening and closing `` tags. > [!CAUTION] > 此控件用于显示用户输入，这可能包括恶意客户端脚本。This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script. 检查从客户端的可执行脚本、 SQL 语句或其他代码之前发送应用程序中显示的任何信息。Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application. 验证控件可用于在控件中显示输入的文本之前验证用户输入。You can use validation controls to verify user input before displaying the input text in a control. ASP.NET 提供了用户输入到脚本块和 HTML 的输入的请求验证功能。ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input. 有关详细信息，请参阅[保护标准控件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8)，[如何： 保护对脚本攻击在 Web 应用程序通过应用 HTML 编码为字符串](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b)，和[中验证用户输入ASP.NET Web Pages](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461)。For more information, see [Securing Standard Controls](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8), [How to: Protect Against Script Exploits in a Web Application by Applying HTML Encoding to Strings](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b), and [Validating User Input in ASP.NET Web Pages](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来控制中的选定项的内容控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to control the contents of the selected item in the control. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单个文件代码模型，如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件可能无法正常运行。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空文本文件。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来控制各项间分隔符的内容控件。Use the property to control the contents of the separator between the items of the control. 分隔符允许将包含在每个项之间的自定义内容的元素控件。The separator allows you to place an element with custom content between each item in the control. 各项间分隔符的外观控制是通过属性。The appearance of the separator between the items of the control is controlled by the property. 若要指定用于分隔符的模板，请将置于``标记的开始和结束标记之间控件。To specify a template for the separator, place the `` tags between the opening and closing tags of the control. 然后可以列出模板的开始和结束之间的内容``标记。You can then list the contents of the template between the opening and closing `` tags. > [!CAUTION] > 此控件用于显示用户输入，这可能包括恶意客户端脚本。This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script. 检查从客户端的可执行脚本、 SQL 语句或其他代码之前发送应用程序中显示的任何信息。Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application. 验证控件可用于在控件中显示输入的文本之前验证用户输入。You can use validation controls to verify user input before displaying the input text in a control. ASP.NET 提供了用户输入到脚本块和 HTML 的输入的请求验证功能。ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input. 有关详细信息，请参阅[保护标准控件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8)，[如何： 保护对脚本攻击在 Web 应用程序通过应用 HTML 编码为字符串](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b)，和[中验证用户输入ASP.NET Web Pages](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461)。For more information, see [Securing Standard Controls](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8), [How to: Protect Against Script Exploits in a Web Application by Applying HTML Encoding to Strings](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b), and [Validating User Input in ASP.NET Web Pages](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来控制内容中各项间分隔符的控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to control the contents of the separator between each item in the control. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单个文件代码模型，如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件可能无法正常运行。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空文本文件。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event UpdateCommand As DataListCommandEventHandler

summary.span: 对 控件中的某项单击 按钮时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the button is clicked for an item in the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时`Update`按钮的单击某项。The event is raised when the `Update` button for an item is clicked. 典型处理程序事件更新的数据集属性设置为`-1`（若要取消选择项），然后将重新绑定到数据控件。A typical handler for the event updates the data, sets the property to `-1` (to deselect the item), and then rebinds the data to the control. > [!CAUTION] > 此控件用于显示用户输入，这可能包括恶意客户端脚本。This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script. 检查从客户端的可执行脚本、 SQL 语句或其他代码之前发送应用程序中显示的任何信息。Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application. 验证控件可用于在控件中显示输入的文本之前验证用户输入。You can use validation controls to verify user input before displaying the input text in a control. ASP.NET 提供了用户输入到脚本块和 HTML 的输入的请求验证功能。ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input. 有关详细信息，请参阅[保护标准控件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8)，[如何： 保护对脚本攻击在 Web 应用程序通过应用 HTML 编码为字符串](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b)，和[中验证用户输入ASP.NET Web Pages](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461)。For more information, see [Securing Standard Controls](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8), [How to: Protect Against Script Exploits in a Web Application by Applying HTML Encoding to Strings](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b), and [Validating User Input in ASP.NET Web Pages](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461). 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[如何： 使用 Web 窗体应用程序中的事件](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-consume-events-in-a-web-forms-application.md)。For more information about handling events, see [How to: Consume Events in a Web Forms Application](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-consume-events-in-a-web-forms-application.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何指定和编写代码的处理程序事件。The following code example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for the event. 它允许你更新中的选定的项与用户输入的新值的控件时`Update`单击按钮。It allows you to update the selected item in the control with the new values entered by the user when the `Update` button is clicked. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单个文件代码模型，如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件可能无法正常运行。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空文本文件。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417).
